transcript:
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir mera baat to do minute suniye sir.
Executive: Sir main mujhe kuch nahi karna hai aapke sath aap phone rakh dijiye sir please. 
Customer: Sir do minute phone to lijiye sir.
Executive: Aap phone rakh dijiye aap bar bar mera time kharab kar rahe hai sir aap phone rakh dijiye mujhe kuch bhi nahi karna hai. 
Customer: Koi baat nahi hai sir agar aapko jo karna hai karne do meri company bhi aap le lo aap chala lo koi baat nahi.
Executive: Sir wo baat nahi hai sir main.
Executive: Main itne proof wagera nahi de sakta hu sir. 
Executive: Main proof wagera believe hai aapko believe hai aap kijiye nahi to aap chod dijiye resolve bol ke chod dijiye. 
Executive: Mujhe aainda call mat kijiye please.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants the executive to listen for two minutes.

- Offered the executive to take over and run his company.



Resolution:

- The executive refused to listen.

- The executive stated he cannot provide proof.

- The executive asked the customer not to call again.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Frustrated to resigned.



@@@Key Topics:

none
